_header: Thou Mother to wretches and other disconsolate
Subjects: chronicles, verse in; Virgin Mary, salutation to; Virgin Mary, joys of
_description: Author’s salute to the Virgin Mary in relation to the fifth of seven joys, at end of Part V of Fabyan’s Chronicle, Part V, cap. 140, translating Latin verse of which the beginning only is given preceding — one stanza rhyme royal
